description:
Have you notice that your child is having difficulty with reading and writing in school?

Are you noticing an increase in frustration due to their academic concerns?

Is this increased level of frustration causing additional concerns in your students academic and social live?

If you answered yes any of the questions above then you have come to the right place, we have a solution for you.

In our free introductory course you will learn from Karlene, Summer’s mother, about similar concerns that Karlene has gone through raising Summer. In Karlene’s extensive interview she discusses Summer’s concerns due to dyslexia in school and how it has effected her personal live as well.

You will also learn from Summer’s interview how our program has helped her to significantly improve her school work and to help put her on the path to her live long dream, to become a published author.

You will also learn from the peer reviewed science what make’s our unique approach so different, and so success. You will also learn from an example of our materials how our program works, and what will be coming in our future courses.

Do you want to help your child to significantly improve their reading and writing skills?

Do you want to aid them in overcome the frustration they are now experiencing in school due to their academic concerns?

Do you wish to assist your child in overcoming these frustrations so that they can improve their social lives?

If you answered yes to any of the questions above then please enroll in our free, introductory course.
title: Dyslexia: A Journey to Reading and Writing Success
